full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 90 of 247 218 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross 1 A. Yes. 2 Q. And that she was a singer; right? 3 A. Yes. That's the way Mr. Epstein introduced her as. 4 Q. And you said that I think she had striking blue eyes; is that right? 5 6 A. Correct. 7 Q. You'll forgive the question, Mr. Visoski, but I think you also remembered that at the time you saw her, you remembered she had large breasts; isn't that right? 8 9 A. She was a mature woman, in my opinion. 10 11 Q. Well, she looked to you like she was in her 20s, as we said before? 12 13 A. Sure, yes. 14 Q. Now, you remember that this meeting took place I think you said in Palm Beach? 15 16 A. It was on the ramp in West Palm Beach, correct. 17 Q. Now, it was sometimes the case that Epstein would invite people onto the plane before takeoff to show them the plane; isn't that right? 18 19 A. Correct. 20 21 Q. And sometimes Epstein brought them into the cockpit to meet the pilots? 22 23 A. That's correct, yes. 24 Q. And these people didn't always fly on the planes; isn't that right? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011862
